attributes.action: postpone all elections within the United Kingdom until such time that current Members of Parliament agree to full disclosure of all payments to them from taxation of citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is absolutely indefensible for MPs and any other elected representative to block or hinder or in any other way attempt to conceal monies for any purpose that they have received from state taxation levied on members of the electorate. The electorate should boycott any constitutional process until this right is stipulated by legal statute.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
